channel.title: Free gps
channel.description:
So I was wondering what would be some fun ways to give out free cash. Obviously I want the cash to benefit me and in a way advertise my clan chat. Other than promoting my clan chat what else could I do to give out free cash. I am looking to give away 100-200k a day. Its not a lot I know but it adds up. Also I want to give the cash to many separate people rather than just one person.
One thing I did today was went to the g.e and said guess a number 1-100 and whoever is closest wins 100k. Only 2 people out of like 100 participated which is really sad. I gave the cash away on the spot. I think I could also make youtube videos of the random things I do.
Just need ideas..
I think the next one will be trading a low level in lumby and giving him 100k and then teleporting the hell out of there.
Thoughts/Ideas?

item.title: Free gps
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

IlikeArrays:

It failed so hard…was trying to lure people with cabbages and put the coins at the end of the line. nobody went for it then some ranger comes and picks it up without following the cabbages.

Aw, I guess there’s so many scams it’s near on impossible to find one legit person. At least they have nothing to lose.

Read full topic

item.title: Free gps
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

Or(better idea) Give me some cash so I can merch with it

Read full topic

haha I am so doing the cabbage one right now. I will record it

item.title: Free gps
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Go to Varrock Castle. The first person to find and tag you (trade) gets the cash.

Or Edgeville dungeon would be good, but you got to find a way that no one cheats. Maybe get a middle man to stand with people and if they run off they are disqualified.

That’s very kind of you by the way, what made you want to do this?

Edit: I’ve got another idea… drop 100k and a wooden shield either side of you and when they appear to the public do a telekinetic spell on the wooden shield letting a random person pick up the gee pees. :s

Edit: or drop a ring of cabbages with a stack of coins in the middle of them and see if a newbie picks them up. Do it somewhere not too busy, do it somewhere where someone would find it very unexpected. You might just make their day.

Read full topic
